articles.title: Trump Seeks Release of Grand Jury Papers on Epstein
articles.description: President Donald Trump's administration has decided to allow the release of grand jury testimony in the case of the late convicted sex offender, Jeffrey Epstein, if the court accepts the proposition.

articles.title: CBS to End 'The Late Show With Stephen Colbert' in 2026
articles.description: CBS has announced it will retire The Late Show with Stephen Colbert in May 2026, citing financial reasons unrelated to performance or content.

articles.title: House Approves $9 Billion in Spending Cuts
articles.description: The House of Representatives voted 216 to 213 in favor of President Trump's rescissions package, clawing back $9 billion in already-approved funding for foreign aid and public broadcasting.
